summary: bELISA is a rapid, low-cost, reliable and useful nanobody-based tool for the serological evaluation of current PEDV vaccines efficacy and indirect diagnosis of PEDV infection. the current diagnostic methods for PEDV are time-consuming and very expensive and rarely meet the requirements for clinical application.
